title: [Bloodriven Village, Gloam Pike]
description: The dense conifer forests to the west serve as backdrop to the three-story buildings lining the cobblestone road.  Torches stand in iron holders that are precariously mounted into the cracked plaster, their black smoke staining the facades.

The snowy conifer forests to the west serve as backdrop to the three-story buildings lining the cobblestone road, the faint trails of woodsmoke drifting far in the distance.  Torches stand in iron holders that are precariously mounted into the cracked plaster, each one hung with colorful glass ornaments.
